snippet: This Sunday’s public editor column looks at The Times’s new quote approval policy.
abstract: This Sunday’s public editor column looks at The Times’s new quote approval policy.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times draws a line on “quote approval,” but not everyone is convinced. My column takes a look at the reaction to The Times’s new policy. I wrote previously about this topic in the Public Editor’s Journal on Sept. 17 and Sept. 20. Read more »

headline.main: Sunday Column: Who Controls the Story?
